name: The Maze (enricortinovis, Lynx, Shmeltzi)
description:
You wake up in a dark maze in the middle of nowhere, locked in a cage. You don't even remember anything about how you've arrived there.

You only know one thing: you must get out of it as quickly as possible to survive!

The Maze's denizens don't take kindly to intruders, and will follow you relentlessly so keep moving!
